siteMetadata.description: A front-end developer based in Los Angeles, CA. I'm passionated about learning new technologies and build performant websites and applications.

education.title: University of Washington
education.major: Master of Communication in Digital Media

education.title: Huazhong University of Sci. and Tech.
education.major: Bachelor of Media Study/Minor in Computer Science

accomplishments: Lead projects and initiatives by reviewing code, making architectural decisions, managing code refactors, and coordinating with business, UI, UX, and product.
Build reusable UI components, scalable layouts, and complex ads displaying modules in a Vue+Python Flask App.
Develop and maintain JS libraries that support data logging and content embedding, and ads loading; And a Mapping components library that provides dynamic mapping, routing, and searching.
Experience bootstrapping and maintaining frontend projects/packages including type checking, linting, testing, transpiling modern JS, and shipping code targeting NPM users and Script users.
Leverage tools like Google lighthouse, WebPageSpeedTest, Webpack bundle analyzer to monitor performance metrics. And build adaptive user experience focusing on accessibility, SEO, and performance.
Worked closely with clients, PMs, and designers to deliver features, manage expectations, and meet deadlines.
Built high-quality Shopify themes that are easy to customize, responsive, and performant.
Fixed bugs and performed optimizations for more than 20 Shopify sites.
Wrote Ruby scripts with Shopify Scripts API to automate discount campaigns and customize shipping and payment options.
Built Shopify apps boilerplate that handles installation and authentication with Shopify.
Wore multiple hats including UI, UX, and Dev to design and build landing pages.
Componentized frontend codebase to improve reusability and scalability.
Built a chat-bot prototype with Microsoft Bot Framework.
Developed landing pages and UI components
Visualized data and created CSS/JS animations
